capstonemod.attributeslist.title: Brain Link Attributes
capstonemod.config.title: Brain Link Settings
capstonemod.configscreen.title: Brain Link Settings
capstonemod.updatedelay.tooltip: Delay between updates of the player's attribute values.
capstonemod.datatimeused.tooltip: Determines how many seconds of recent data to use for calculating a baseline for the brain activity.
capstonemod.scalar.tooltip:
Controls how much the attribute is affected by brain activity.
Higher values mean stronger effects.
0 disables the effect.
capstonemod.invertscalar.tooltip: Inverts the scalar so that the attribute scales in the opposite direction of brain activity.
capstonemod.maxmultiplier.tooltip: The maximum multiplier for this attribute. If less than Min Multiplier, Min Multiplier will be used instead.
capstonemod.minmultiplier.tooltip: The minimum multiplier for this attribute.
capstonemod.threshold.tooltip: The attribute is only affected above this level of relative brain activity, where 1 is the user's baseline brain activity.
capstonemod.invertthreshold.tooltip: Inverts the threshold so that the attribute is only affected when the brain activity is below the threshold.
capstonemod.o1.tooltip: O1 is the back left electrode.
capstonemod.o2.tooltip: O2 is the back right electrode.
capstonemod.t3.tooltip: T3 is the middle left electrode.
capstonemod.t4.tooltip: T4 is the middle right electrode.
capstonemod.signal.tooltip: The raw electrical signals from the brain.
capstonemod.waves.tooltip: The different types of brain waves.
capstonemod.setdatasource.tooltip: Set which type of brain activity to use for game interaction.
